message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $12,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product, as I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to me is $12,000
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which still leaves you with a good profit. Let me know what you think.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't want to go any higher than that
